subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: In Focus upset Deweycheatumnhowe in the $500,000 Breeders Crown 3-year-old Colt Trot on Saturday at the Meadowlands Racetrack. In Focus beat his stablemate Holiday Credit by 4 1/4 lengths. After setting all the fractions, Deweycheatumnhowe faded to third in his final race. He will stand at stud next season. It was a disappointing end to a career in which Deweycheatumnhowe won 22 of 25 races. He developed a throat and mouth infection last week, and the illness seemed to sap him of his usual finish.
